title: The Church Is Organized in Fayette
subtitle: By Arie Van De Graaff
short_title: The Church Is Organized in Fayette
content: The Church Is Organized in Fayette
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints was organized on April 6, 1830, inside the Peter Whitmer home in Fayette, New York. Find the hidden objects in this scene of the Whitmer home.
